author: Michelle Ye Hee Lee, Michelle Ye Hee Lee
title: Trump fundraisers attack China's response to coronavirus in bid to secure campaign donations
description: Appeal reflects an increased effort by the president to use US-China relations as a campaign issue against Joe Biden
content: A fundraising committee for President Trumps re-election is using his renewed attacks on the Chinese governments handling of the coronavirus pandemic to mobilise donors, urging supporters in an email Tuesday to hold China accountable by contributing to his ca… [+4880 chars]
